archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Operation
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.12.1] The purpose of the Operation process is to use the system to deliver its services.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 95

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.4.12.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Betrieb" besteht darin, die Dienste des Systems zu nutzen. Dieser Prozess findet häufig parallel zum Prozess "Wartung" statt".
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.4.12.1] The purpose of the Operation process is to use the system to deliver its services.
